abstract:
Azam et al. (2011), introduce the notion of complex valued metric spaces and
obtained common �fixed point result for mappings in the context of complex valued
metric spaces. Rao et al. (2013), introduce the notion of complex valued b-metric
spaces. In this paper, we generalize the results of Azam et al. (2011), and Bhatt et
al. (2011), by improving the conditions of contraction to establish the existence and
uniqueness of common �fixed point for two self mappings on complex valued b-metric
spaces. Some examples are given to illustrate the main results.
